attributes.action: Ban Children's advertising with children with cameras watching testing products in bathrooms.
attributes.additional_details: Ban the use of children in adverts aimed at selling nappies or shampoo for example that show children in bathrooms using these products. It is wrong as they lack the understanding to know why they are filmed, which is then broadcast on TV. It is a form of abuse even with the parents consent it should be banned as companies use this for pester-power & money making.
